name: Coffee—12 oz hot
description: Cup of coffee

name: stream
description: HD streaming on TV

name: HD video streaming—per hour
description: One hour of high-definition video streaming on any device.
notes: Aggregates playback plus network electricity for representative HD streaming.

name: UHD video streaming—per hour
description: One hour of ultra-high-definition (4K) streaming on any device.
notes: Aggregates playback plus network electricity for representative UHD streaming.

name: HD video streaming on TV—per hour
description: One hour of high-definition video streaming delivered to a television via broadband.
notes: Electricity use covers device playback plus network and data-centre demand per hour of 1080p streaming.

name: Meal with beef—per serving
description: One serving of a meal including 150 grams of cooked beef.
notes: Includes cradle-to-grave emissions for a representative beef meal portion.

name: Meal with chicken—per serving
description: One serving of a meal including 150 grams of cooked chicken.
notes: Includes cradle-to-grave emissions for a representative chicken meal portion.

name: Vegetarian meal—per serving
description: One serving of a vegetarian meal centered on legumes and vegetables.
notes: Includes cradle-to-grave emissions for a representative plant-based meal portion.

name: Ultra HD (4K) video streaming on TV—per hour
description: One hour of ultra-high-definition (4K) streaming to a television.
notes: EF to be added after validating 4K bandwidth intensity.

name: Mobile social media browsing—per hour
description: Scrolling a social media feed on a smartphone over mobile or Wi-Fi data.
notes: Electricity covers handset use plus average data-transfer intensity per hour of social media use.

name: HD video conference per participant-hour
description: One participant attending a high-definition video conference for one hour.
notes: Electricity accounts for end-user device plus upstream/downstream data transfer to cloud meeting services.

name: Audio-only conference per participant-hour
description: One participant attending an audio-only conference for one hour.
notes: Pending bandwidth-only EF.

name: LLM inference—1K token response
description: Generating an approximately 1,000-token response from a general-purpose large language model.
notes: Electricity covers GPU inference plus supporting data centre overhead for a single 1k-token completion.

name: LLM usage—OpenAI GPT query
description: Processing approximately 1,000 tokens with OpenAI GPT.
unit_definition: 1k_tokens means one thousand combined prompt and completion tokens processed.
notes: Representative of cloud-hosted GPT-4 class usage under mixed North American datacentre regions.

name: LLM usage—Anthropic Claude query
description: Processing approximately 1,000 tokens with Anthropic Claude.
unit_definition: 1k_tokens means one thousand combined prompt and completion tokens processed.
notes: Representative of cloud-hosted Claude 3 class usage with North American datacentre mix.

name: LLM usage—Google Gemini query
description: Processing approximately 1,000 tokens with Google Gemini.
unit_definition: 1k_tokens means one thousand combined prompt and completion tokens processed.
notes: Representative of Gemini inference on carbon-optimized Google Cloud TPU infrastructure.

name: Download 50 GB console game
description: Downloading a 50 gigabyte digital game to a console.
notes: Pending validation against broadband download intensity.

name: Cloud storage sync per GB-month
description: Maintaining one gigabyte of synced cloud storage for one month.
unit_definition: gb_month equals one gigabyte stored and synced for one month.
notes: To be updated with hyperscale storage intensity.

name: Cloud data download—per GB
description: Transferring one gigabyte of data from a cloud service to a consumer device.
unit_definition: GB refers to a gigabyte of data downloaded.
notes: Electricity covers wide-area data transfer and data-centre egress for cloud content delivery.

name: School run by car—per kilometre
description: Passenger kilometres for a school run completed by car.
notes: Passengers default to one when unspecified.

name: School run by bike—per kilometre
description: Distance travelled by bicycle for a school run.

name: Toronto subway—per passenger-kilometre
description: Passenger kilometres travelled on the Toronto subway.
notes: Electric rapid transit energy intensity per passenger kilometre.

name: Toronto bus—per passenger-kilometre
description: Passenger kilometres travelled on Toronto Transit Commission buses.
notes: Diesel fleet operational intensity per passenger kilometre.

name: Ontario grid electricity—per kWh
description: One kilowatt-hour delivered by the Ontario IESO-managed grid.
notes: Supports grid intensity reporting for Ontario electricity.

name: Forklift material handling—per operating hour
description: Operating an electric or propane forklift for one hour of material handling within a light-industrial facility.
notes: Pending validated load-factor and fuel split assumptions for forklifts.

name: Warehouse base building load—per ft²-month
description: Maintaining base building services (lighting, ventilation, idle equipment) for one square foot of light-industrial warehouse over a month.
unit_definition: ft2_month equals one square foot maintained for one calendar month.
notes: Requires region-specific base-load and occupancy schedule data prior to activation.

name: Class-6 beverage delivery—per kilometre
description: Demo intensity reference for beverage truck deliveries.
notes: Demo seed only
